items.sentence: Why did you ask for my opinion if you\'d already made up your mind anyway?
Tom told Mary not to wait up because he wouldn\'t be home until very late.
Tom told Mary that she shouldn\'t include her phone number in her profile.
He didn\'t see the stop sign and almost hit the child crossing the street.
He hung his blazer on a hanger because he didn\'t want it to get wrinkled.
